description.french: Tous les succès ont été débloqués
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti gli obiettivi
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los logros
description.schinese: 解锁所有成就
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有成就
description.japanese: すべての実績を解除した
description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os troféus

description.french: Vous avez collecté les 120 héros.
description.italian: Hai riunito 120 eroi
description.spanish: Has coleccionado los 120 héroes.
description.schinese: 已集结全部 120 位英雄
description.tchinese: 集結全部 120 位英雄
description.japanese: 英雄が120人全員集まった
description.brazilian: Coletou todos os 120 heróis

description.english: Cleared the game and watched the ending.
description.german: Das Spiel abgeschlossen und das Ende angesehen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu et regardé la cinématique finale.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco e guardato il finale.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego y visto el final.
description.schinese: 已通关游戏并观看结局。
description.tchinese: 通關遊戲並觀看結局
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアしてエンディングを見た
description.brazilian: Concluiu o jogo e assistiu ao encerramento.

description.english: Upgraded all allies’ weapons to the highest level.
description.german: Die Waffen aller Verbündeten auf die höchste Stufe verbessert.
description.french: Vous avez amélioré toutes les armes des alliés jusqu’à leur niveau maximal.
description.italian: Hai migliorato le armi di tutti gli alleati portandole al livello massimo.
description.koreana: 모든 동료의 무기를 최고 레벨까지 강화했다.
description.spanish: Has mejorado todas las armas de todos los aliados al nivel máximo.
description.schinese: 已将所有盟友的武器升至满级。
description.tchinese: 將所有夥伴的武器強化至最高級
description.russian: Улучшили оружие всех союзников до максимального уровня.
description.japanese: 全ての仲間の武器を最高レベルまで強化した
description.brazilian: Aprimorou as armas de todos os aliados ao nível mais alto.

description.english: Unlocked all development panels in the Drafting Studio.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les panneaux de développement dans le studio de déploiement.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i pannelli di sviluppo nello Studio di progettazione.
description.koreana: 건축 설계실에서 모든 발전 패널을 해방했다.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los paneles de desarrollo en el estudio de diseño.
description.schinese: 已解锁制图工作室的所有开发面板。
description.tchinese: 解鎖建築設計室的所有開發面板
description.russian: Открыли все панели развития в чертежной мастерской.
description.japanese: 建築設計室で全ての発展パネルを解放した
description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os painéis de desenvolvimento no Estúdio de Esboços.

displayName.german: Held jenseits von Zeit und Raum
displayName.french: Héros au-delà du temps et de l'espace
displayName.italian: Al di là del tempo e dello spazio
displayName.spanish: Héroe más allá del espacio y tiempo
displayName.brazilian: Herói Além do Tempo e Espaço

description.english: Passed all trials at the Proving Grounds.
description.german: Alle Prüfungen auf dem Prüfungsfeld bestanden.
description.french: Vous avez réussi toutes les épreuves du terrain d’épreuve.
description.italian: Hai superato tutte le prove nell’Arena delle prove.
description.spanish: Has superado todos los desafíos en las Tierras de prueba.
description.schinese: 已通过试炼场的所有试炼。
description.tchinese: 通過試煉場的所有試煉
description.japanese: 英雄の試練場を全て攻略した
description.brazilian: Passou em todos os testes no Campo das Provações.

description.french: Vous avez amené Nowa jusqu’au niveau 99.
description.italian: Hai portato Nowa al livello 99.
description.spanish: Has subido el nivel de Nowa a 99.
description.schinese: 已将诺瓦升至 99 级。
description.tchinese: 將諾瓦提升至 99 級
description.japanese: ノアのレベルが99になった
description.brazilian: Subiu o nível do Nowa ao 99.

description.french: Vous avez bâti un repère.
description.italian: Hai costruito un punto di riferimento.
description.spanish: Has construido un monumento.
description.schinese: 已建造一栋地标建筑。
description.tchinese: 建造一座地標建築
description.japanese: ランドマークを1つ建設した
description.brazilian: Construiu um marco de identificação.

description.french: Vous avez gagné 1 million de baqua en faisant du commerce.
description.italian: Hai guadagnato 1 milione di baqua dagli scambi commerciali.
description.spanish: Has ganado 1 millón de baquas comerciando.
description.schinese: 已通过贸易赚取 1,000,000 巴库币。
description.tchinese: 透過交易賺取 1,000,000 巴庫幣
description.russian: Заработали 1 миллион бакви с помощью торговли.
description.japanese: 交易で1,000,000バッカ儲けた
description.brazilian: Ganhou 1 milhão de baqua com comércio.

displayName.english: A Place for Heroes to Return
displayName.spanish: Un lugar al que regresen los héroes
displayName.brazilian: Um Lugar Para os Heróis Retornarem

description.french: Le niveau maximum du quartier général a été atteint.
description.italian: Hai massimizzato il quartier generale.
description.spanish: Has subido el nivel del cuartel general al máximo.
description.schinese: 已将总部等级升至最高级。
description.tchinese: 將根據地的等級提升至最高級
description.japanese: 本拠街レベルを最大にした
description.brazilian: Maximizou o nível do Quartel-general.

description.french: Vous avez ouvert tous les coffres au trésor.
description.italian: Hai aperto tutti i forzieri del tesoro.
description.spanish: Has abierto todos los cofres del tesoro.
description.schinese: 已开启所有宝箱。
description.tchinese: 開啟所有寶箱
description.japanese: 全ての宝箱を開けた
description.brazilian: Abriu todos os baús do tesouro.

description.english: Found the Primal Lens in the Runebarrows.
description.german: Die Urzeit-Linse in den Runenhügeln gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la lentille primitive dans le tumulus runique.
description.italian: Hai trovato la lente grezza nelle Rovine runiche.
description.koreana: 룬 유적에서 태고의 룬 렌즈를 발견했다.
description.spanish: Has encontrado la lente primigenia en la Tumulorruna.
description.schinese: 找到符文遗迹里的原初透镜。
description.tchinese: 找到符文遺跡裡的原始透鏡
description.japanese: ルーンの遺跡で原初の魔導レンズを発見した
description.brazilian: Encontrou a Lente Primeva na Cripta Rúnica.

displayName.english: A Day in the Life of the Watch
displayName.german: Ein Tag im Leben der Wache
displayName.french: Une journée dans la vie de la Garde
displayName.spanish: Un día en la vida de la guardia
displayName.brazilian: Um Dia na Vida da Patrulha

description.french: Vous avez puni Kogen et son groupe.
description.italian: Hai punito Kogen e la sua banda.
description.spanish: Has castigado a Kogen y su pandilla.
description.schinese: 惩罚了柯根和他的团伙。
description.tchinese: 懲罰柯根和他的同夥
description.japanese: コゲン一味を懲らしめた
description.brazilian: Puniu Kogen e seu grupo.

description.english: Nowa’s hometown Kyshiri Village is burned by Hurstwine.
description.german: Nowas Heimatdorf Kyshiri wurde von Hurstwine niedergebrannt.
description.french: Hurstwine a incendié la ville natale de Nowa, le village de Kyshiri.
description.italian: Kyshiri, il villaggio natale di Nowa, è stato bruciato da Hurstwine.
description.spanish: Hurstwine ha incendiado la aldea de Kyshiri, donde nació Nowa.
description.schinese: 诺瓦的家乡基希里村被赫斯特瓦恩放火烧了。
description.tchinese: 諾瓦的家鄉基希里村被赫斯特瓦恩放火燒了
description.russian: Эрствин сжег деревню Кишири, родину Новы.
description.japanese: ヒュースバインによって故郷のクシリ村が燃やされた
description.brazilian: A cidade natal do Nowa, Aldeia de Kyshiri, foi queimada por Hurstwine.

displayName.french: Brandir le drapeau de la résistance
displayName.spanish: Izando la bandera de la resistencia

description.english: Nowa raised an army of resistance.
description.french: Nowa a levé une armée de résistance.
description.italian: Nowa ha formato un esercito di resistenza.
description.spanish: Nowa ha formado un ejército de la resistencia.
description.schinese: 诺瓦组织了一支抵抗军。
description.tchinese: 諾瓦組成了一支反抗軍
description.japanese: ノアは抵抗の軍を立ち上げた
description.brazilian: Nowa ergueu um exército da resistência.

displayName.japanese: 試練の儀式を乗り越えて

description.english: Kallathor passes the Proving Ground trials.
description.german: Kallathor hat die Prüfungen des Prüfungsfelds bestanden.
description.french: Kallathor réussit les épreuves du terrain d’épreuve.
description.italian: Kallathor ha superato le prove dell’Arena delle prove
description.spanish: Kallathor ha superado los desafíos de las Tierras de prueba.
description.schinese: 卡拉索尔通过了试炼场的试炼。
description.tchinese: 卡拉索爾通過了試煉場的試煉
description.japanese: キャルラトーラは試練の儀式を乗り越えた
description.brazilian: Kallathor passou nos testes do Campo das Provações.

displayName.japanese: ハイシャーンは守られた

description.french: Vous avez défendu Hishahn avec succès.
description.italian: Hai difeso Hishahn.
description.spanish: Has logrado defender Hishahn.
description.schinese: 成功保卫哈萨恩。
description.tchinese: 成功保衛哈薩恩
description.japanese: ハイシャーンの防衛に成功した
description.brazilian: Derrotou Hishahn.

displayName.japanese: 誉れあるシャークマン

description.german: Nowa hat die Shi’arc als Verbündete begrüßt.
description.french: Nowa a accueilli les Shi’arcs en tant qu’alliés.
description.italian: Nowa si è alleato con gli sk’uali.
description.spanish: Nowa ha recibido a los shi’arcas como aliados.
description.schinese: 诺瓦欢迎希亚克人成为盟友。
description.tchinese: 諾瓦歡迎沙亞克人成為夥伴
description.japanese: ノアはシャークマンたちを仲間に迎え入れた
description.brazilian: Nowa recebeu os shi'arcs como aliados.

description.english: Seign took leave of his father to pursue his own path.
description.german: Seign verließ seinen Vater, um seinen eigenen Weg zu gehen.
description.french: Seign a quitté son père pour suivre sa propre voie.
description.italian: Seign si è congedato da suo padre per seguire la propria strada.
description.koreana: 세이는 자신의 길을 가기 위해 아버지께 하직을 고했다.
description.spanish: Seign se ha despedido de su padre para seguir su propio camino.
description.schinese: 什恩与父亲道别，踏上了自己选择的路。
description.tchinese: 賽恩與父親道別，踏上了自己選擇的路
description.russian: Сейн покинул отца и выбрал собственный путь.
description.japanese: セイは己の道を進むため父に別れを告げた
description.brazilian: Seign se despediu do pai para trilhar seu próprio caminho.

description.french: Marisa a juré de récupérer sa « maison ».
description.italian: Marisa ha promesso di riprendersi la sua "casa".
description.spanish: Marisa ha jurado recuperar su «hogar».
description.schinese: 玛丽莎发誓要夺回她的“家”。
description.tchinese: 瑪麗莎發誓要奪回她的「家」
description.japanese: メリサは必ず『家』を取り戻すと誓った
description.brazilian: Marisa jurou retomar seu "lar".

displayName.english: Songs of Valor on the Great Sandy Sea
displayName.german: Lieder über den Mut im Großen Sandmeer
displayName.french: Chants de bravoure du grand désert
displayName.italian: Valorosi canti sul Grande mare sabbioso
displayName.spanish: Canciones de valor del Gran mar de arena
displayName.tchinese: 迴響於大沙海上的英勇讚歌
displayName.russian: Песнь о доблести в Большом песчаном море
displayName.brazilian: Canções de Valor no Grande Mar Arenoso

description.english: Nowa and his friends escaped dire straits.
description.german: Nowa und seine Freunde sind aus Schwierigkeiten entkommen.
description.french: Nowa et ses amis ont échappé à une situation désespérée.
description.italian: Nowa e i suoi amici sono scampati alle difficoltà.
description.spanish: Nowa y sus amigos han salido de un aprieto.
description.schinese: 诺瓦和他的朋友们绝处逢生。
description.tchinese: 諾瓦和他的夥伴們絕處逢生
description.russian: Нова с друзьями спаслись из безвыходного положения.
description.japanese: ノアたちは絶体絶命のピンチを乗り越えた
description.brazilian: Nowa e seus amigos escaparam apesar dos perrengues.

description.english: Repelled the Imperial Army and held a victory feast.
description.german: Die Reichsarmee abgewehrt und ein Festmahl zur Siegesfeier abgehalten.
description.french: Vous avez repoussé l’armée impériale et organisé un festin de victoire.
description.italian: Hai respinto l’esercito imperiale e organizzato una festa per la vittoria.
description.spanish: Has ahuyentado al ejército imperial y preparado un banquete de la victoria.
description.schinese: 击退帝国军，举行庆功宴。
description.tchinese: 擊退帝國軍，舉行慶功宴
description.russian: Отбили вторжение имперской армии и устроили пир в честь победы.
description.japanese: 帝国軍を撃退して勝利の宴が開かれた
description.brazilian: Repeliu o exército imperial e celebrou com um banquete da vitória.

description.english: The night before the battle, on the castle rooftop appeared...
description.german: In der Nacht vor der Schlacht erschien auf dem Dach der Burg ...
description.french: La nuit précédant la bataille, une silhouette est apparue sur le toit du château...
description.italian: Alla vigilia della battaglia, apparve in cima al castello...
description.koreana: 결전 전야, 성의 옥상에 나타난 것은...
description.spanish: La noche antes de la batalla, en el tejado del castillo apareció...
description.schinese: 战斗前夜，城堡房顶上出现了……
description.tchinese: 戰鬥前夜，城堡房頂上出現了……
description.russian: В ночь перед сражением на крыше замка появляется...
description.japanese: 決戦前夜、城の屋上に現れたのは・・・
description.brazilian: Na noite antes da batalha, apareceu na cobertura do castelo...

description.french: Vous avez utilisé le mode Combat auto pendant 100 tours.
description.italian: Hai usato la funzione automatica in 100 turni di battaglia.
description.spanish: Has usado el «auto» durante 100 turnos en batalla.
description.schinese: 已在战斗中使用 100 回合“自动”。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中使用 100 回合「自動」
description.russian: Проведите 100 ходов в бою, в авторежиме.
description.japanese: バトルで「おまかせ」を100ターン使用した
description.brazilian: Usou "Automático" por 100 turnos em batalha.

description.french: Vous avez activé 20 combos de héros différents.
description.italian: Hai attivato 20 diverse combo di eroi.
description.spanish: Has activado 20 combos heroicos distintos.
description.schinese: 已发动 20 次不同的英雄连击。
description.tchinese: 發動 20 次不同的英雄連擊
description.japanese: 20種類の英雄コンボを発動した
description.brazilian: Ativou 20 combos diferentes de heróis.

description.english: Maxed out a weapon’s level for the first time.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal eine Waffenstufe auf Maximum gebracht.
description.french: Le niveau maximum d'une arme a été atteint pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai massimizzato un’arma per la prima volta.
description.koreana: 처음으로 무기 레벨을 최고 레벨까지 강화했다.
description.spanish: Has subido el nivel de un arma al máximo por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次将武器强化至最高级。
description.tchinese: 首次將武器強化至最高級
description.russian: Впервые повысили уровень оружия до максимума.
description.japanese: 初めて武器のレベルを最高レベルまで強化した
description.brazilian: Melhorou o nível de uma arma ao máximo pela primeira vez.

description.french: Vous avez déclenché 40 événements de source chaude différents.
description.italian: Hai assistito a 40 avvenimenti diversi alle terme.
description.spanish: Has visto 40 eventos de termas distintos.
description.schinese: 已触发 40 个不同的温泉事件。
description.tchinese: 觸發 40 個不同的溫泉事件
description.russian: Активировали 40 различных событий в горячих источниках.
description.japanese: 温泉イベントを40種類発生させた
description.brazilian: Ativou 40 eventos diferentes na fonte termal.

description.english: Dealt over 3,000 damage in a single turn to an enemy.
description.german: Einem Gegner in einer einzigen Runde über 3.000 Schaden zugefügt.
description.french: Vous avez infligé plus de 3 000 points de dégâts à un ennemi en un seul tour.
description.italian: Hai inflitto oltre 3.000 danni a un nemico in un solo turno.
description.koreana: 적 하나에 3,000 이상의 대미지를 한 턴 내에 입혔다.
description.spanish: Has infligido más de 3000 de daño en un solo turno a un enemigo.
description.schinese: 已在单回合内对一个敌人造成超过 3,000 点伤害。
description.tchinese: 在單回合內對一個敵人造成超過 3,000 點的傷害
description.russian: Нанесли врагу более 3000 ед. урона за один ход.
description.japanese: 1ターンで敵1体に3,000以上のダメージを与えた
description.brazilian: Causou mais de 3.000 de dano a um inimigo em um único turno.

displayName.german: Kenne den Gegner, kenne dich selbst
displayName.italian: Conosci il nemico, conosci te stesso
displayName.spanish: Conoce al enemigo, conócete a ti mismo
displayName.brazilian: Conheça a Si Mesmo e Conhecerá o Inimigo

description.french: Vous avez terminé le guide des ennemis.
description.italian: Hai completato il manuale dei nemici.
description.spanish: Has completado la enciclopedia de enemigos.
description.schinese: 已完成敌人图鉴。
description.tchinese: 完成敵人圖鑑
description.japanese: エネミー図鑑を完成させた
description.brazilian: Concluiu a Enciclopédia de inimigos.

description.english: Appraised items 10 times at the Appraiser’s Shop.
description.german: 10-mal Gegenstände im Laden des Gutachters begutachten lassen.
description.french: Vous avez évalué des objets 10 fois à la boutique d’évaluateur.
description.italian: Hai fatto valutare 10 oggetti al negozio del perito.
description.spanish: Has tasado objetos 10 veces en la tienda del tasador.
description.schinese: 已在鉴定所鉴定 10 次物品。
description.tchinese: 在鑑定所鑑定 10 次物品
description.russian: Оценили предметы в лавке оценщика 10 раз.
description.japanese: 鑑定屋で鑑定を10回行った
description.brazilian: Avaliou itens 10 vezes na loja do avaliador.

description.english: Raised the Headquarters level for the first time.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal die Hauptquartier-Stufe erhöht.
description.french: Vous avez augmenté le niveau du quartier général pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai aumentato il livello del quartier generale per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Has subido el nivel del cuartel general por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次升级总部。
description.tchinese: 首次升級根據地
description.japanese: 初めて本拠街のレベルをアップさせた
description.brazilian: Melhorou o nível do Quartel-general pela primeira vez.

displayName.english: The Hero Who Fished the World
displayName.german: Der Held, der die Welt geangelt hat
displayName.french: Le héros qui pêchait le monde entier
displayName.spanish: El héroe que pescó el mundo
displayName.brazilian: O Herói que Pescou o Mundo

description.french: Vous avez attrapé tous les types de poissons.
description.italian: Hai pescato tutti i tipi di pesci.
description.spanish: Has pescado todos los tipos de pez.
description.schinese: 已捕获所有种类的鱼。
description.tchinese: 捕獲所有種類的魚
description.japanese: 釣りで全ての魚を釣り上げた
description.brazilian: Pegou todos os tipos de peixe.

displayName.english: The Hero Whom the Runes Smile On
displayName.german: Der Held, den die Runen anlächeln
displayName.french: Le héros auquel sourient les runes
displayName.spanish: El héroe al que las runas le sonríen
displayName.japanese: ルーンに祝福された英雄
displayName.brazilian: O Herói a quem as Runas Sorriem

description.french: Vous avez collecté toutes les runes.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutte le rune.
description.spanish: Has coleccionado todas las runas.
description.schinese: 已集齐所有符文。
description.tchinese: 集齊所有符文
description.japanese: 全てのルーンを入手した
description.brazilian: Coletou todas as runas.

displayName.brazilian: Eu Gosto de Fragmentos de Runa!

description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les éclats de rune.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutti i frammenti di runa.
description.spanish: Has coleccionado todos los fragmentos de runa.
description.schinese: 已集齐所有符文石。
description.tchinese: 集齊所有符文石
